versos: (fleece) Judges 6:37 - "look, I will place a wool fleece on the threshing floor. If there is dew only on the fleece and all the ground is dry, then I will know that you will save Israel by my hand, as you said.";;;
(heaven) Matthew 6:10 - "Your kingdom come, your will be done, on earth as it is in heaven.";;;
(dry) Genesis 1:9 - And God said, "Let the water under the sky be gathered to one place, and let dry ground appear." And it was so.;;;

(spake) Genesis 22:17 - That in blessing I will bless thee, and in multiplying I will multiply thy seed as the stars of the heaven, and as the sand which is upon the sea shore; and thy seed shall possess the gate of his enemies;;;;
(language) Genesis 11:1 - "Now the whole world had one language and a common speech.";;;
(canaan) Genesis 10:15 - canaan became the father of Sidon his firstborn
(drew) Psalm 18:16 - "He reached down from on high and took hold of me; he drew me out of deep waters.";;;
(near) James 4:8 - "Draw near to God and He will draw near to you.";;;
(ordained) Acts 13:48 - "And as many as were ordained to eternal life believed.";;;
(dragons) Psalm 148:7 - "Praise the Lord from the earth, you great sea creatures and all ocean depths,";;;
(priest) 1 Peter 2:5: "you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.";;;
(abroad) 2 Samuel 12:12 - "For thou didst it secretly: but I will do this thing before all Israel, and before the sun.";;;
(pleased) Genesis 1:31 - "God saw all that he had made, and it was very good. And there was evening, and there was morningthe sixth day.";;;
(stir) Hebrews 10:24 - "Let us consider how to stir up one another to love and good works,";;;
(saith) Matthew 8:26 - And he saith unto them, Why are ye fearful, O ye of little faith Then he arose, and rebuked the winds and the sea; and there was a great calm.;;;
(saviour) "For unto you is born this day in the city of David a saviour, which is Christ the Lord." - Luke 2:11;;;
